Content: 1 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) troops of the 573 Brigade under command to the 57 Division in Kilinochchi joined hands with civilians in the area and cleaned-up the Kandawali rural hospital and its premises on Tuesday (11) as one more community-oriented project. Troops and civilians weeded the hospital compound and rid of its garbage after collecting them to one spot. 573 Brigade Commander, Commanding Officer, 1 Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment Lieutenant Colonel Prasad Bandara with the blessings of the General Officer Commanding, 57 Division, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya conducted the project for the benefit of patients and civilians.
